2014 Perfect Game MLK All-Tournament Teams

February 6, 2014 admin

The following players were selected to the 2014 Perfect Game MLK All-Tournament Teams:

18U TEAM – PITCHERS
Drew Weston: 2-0 14K’s 0.00ERA
Reid Budrovich: 1-0 10K’s 0.00ERA
Nick Ruiz: 1-0 7K’s 0.00ERA

18U TEAM – HITTERS
Austin Gorrell: .455BA 1RBI 2Runs 2BB’s
Drew Weston: .429BA 2RBI’s 1Run 1BB

16U TEAM – PITCHERS
Jonathan Worley: 1-0 14K’s 0.00ERA – No Hitter

16U TEAM - HITTERS
Kevin Avila: .364BA 2RBI’s 2Runs 1BB 1SB
Damien Rinehart: .364BA 2RBI’s 1SB
